title: Fear in the Night (1972) Peter Cushing, Joan Collins | Terror has no bedtime

sources.title: Fear in the Night (1972) Peter Cushing, Joan Collins | Terror has no bedtime
sources.description:
A young woman recovering from a nervous breakdown moves with her husband to a boys' school, and finds herself being terrorized by a mysterious one-armed man, but nobody believes her.

Original Title: Fear in the Night
Alternative Titles: Nachts kommt die Angst, Furcht in der Nacht, 

Director: Jimmy Sangster
Writers: Jimmy Sangster, Michael Syson

Main Cast:
Judy Geeson - Peggy Heller
Joan Collins - Molly Carmichael
Ralph Bates - Robert Heller
Peter Cushing - Michael Carmichael

Genres: Horror, Mystery, Thriller
Release Date: July 9, 1972 (UK)
Filming Locations: Hertfordshire, England, UK
